email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE available for your steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Shanghai. The vessel has a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 250m. The starting freight rate is USD 75/MT on CIF terms. Laycan is 15-20 November. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Miller

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thanks for the offer. USD 75/MT seems a bit high. Can you do USD 70/MT? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

I can offer USD 72/MT. The demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day, and the loading window is 48 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 72/MT is acceptable. Can we adjust the laycan to 17-22 November? Also, please send the recap of terms.

Best,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Recap of Terms - Steel Coils - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Alex,

Please find the recap below:
- Commodity: Steel Coils
- Cargo Size: 12000MT
- Load Port: Rotterdam
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: USD 72/MT CIF
- Laycan: 17-22 November
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day

Let me know if any corrections are needed.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap of Terms - Steel Coils - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

The recap looks good. Please proceed with the booking.

Best,
Alex
